sections.description: This section guides the user on how to add new wallet in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Wallet' section and you will be navigated to 'Wallet' page.
On the 'Wallet' page, click on the '+' icon located at the top right corner.
A pop-up will appear with two fields on this 'Wallet' page. The fields are: 'Transaction Type' (dropdown list) and 'Status' (dropdown list). Select the appropriate values and click the 'Add' button.

sections.description: This section guides the user on how to add a new bank in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Bank' section and you will be navigated to 'Bank' page.
On the 'Bank' page, click on the '+' icon located at the top right corner.

A pop-up will appear with five fields on the 'Bank' page. The fields are: 'Bank Name' (input), 'Bank Short Name' (input), 'Bank Headquarter' (input), 'Bank Code' (input), and 'Status' (dropdown). Select the appropriate values and click the 'Add' button.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching for a wallet in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Wallet' section and you will be navigated to 'Wallet' page.
On the 'Wallet' page, click on the 'Search' icon located at the top left corner.
Type the wallet name you want to search. If data for the wallet exist, it will be displayed.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching for a bank in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Bank' section and you will be navigated to 'Bank' page.
On the 'Bank' page, click on the 'Search' icon located at the top left corner.
Type the bank name you want to search. If data for bank exist, it will be displayed.

sections.description: This section would let user know where the wallet page is located in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Wallet' section and you will be navigated to 'Wallet' page.
Now you are on the 'Wallet' page. You can add, view, edit, or delete wallet information from this page.
